item.title: Comment on How is the Russian war economy doing? by Crikey
item.description:
Reply to Gardel:

End the war and go back to pre-2014 borders, problem solved.

Ending the war and getting the hell out of Ukraine would be great for the average Russian. Unfortunately, the super-geniuses who got Russia into this situation don't think it would be good for them and are trying to put it off as long as possible - no matter the cost in other people's lives.
